Load historical temp data

```{r}
load("../temp/hist-dat-clean.Rdata")
```

```{r}
hist.mods <- foreach(i = 1:5) %do% {
  
  hist.mods <- fit_hist_model(hist.temps = hist.dat, days_lag = i,
                              local = F, date = NULL)
  
}

save(hist.mods,file= "../temp/historical-temp-mods.Rdata")
```
